title: Feral Pleasures
description: She discovered he was part stag, but all man. He was a wild love-god in a world grown too tame.
quote: Be not afraid. The forest nymphs have taught me how to please a woman.
altHero: a man with long wavy hair and deer antlers looks at the camera in front of a bonfire
alt1: the stag man peeks out from behind a tree
alt3: the stag man played by a different actor
alt4: the stag woman in only her bra, ready to be taken
